item.title: What's Been Going On This Week
item.description: This week's Newsblade top picks from around the cryptointernets.
item.author: news@altcointrading.net
item.dc:creator: KarlvonBahnhof, info@altcointrading.net
item.content:encoded:
More of practical discussion in anonymizing Bitcoin transactions via coinjoin and similar (Bitcoin-Dev mailing list in January 2019)

[Read it]

ICE Updated their Bakkt specs page

[Read it]

Asian dApp games are rife with Chinese New Year deals

[Read it]

Tradeblock compares centralized vs non-custodial exchanges in terms of traded volume, fees and regulations

[Read it]

Amazon Partners On New Ethereum Marketplace For Enterprises / via @forbes

[Read it]

Blockstream proposes a centralized solution to BTC fragmented liquidity - sidechain where tx are validated by big trading houses lie Bitfinex, OKCoin or Rock Trading / via @forbes

[Read it]

Tooling for crypto traders - Reddit Sentiment Analysis with link to full code so that you can literally $DYOR. By @rados_io

[Read it]

item.title: Recently Updated Articles on AltcoinTrading.NET:
item.description: Articles updated within the last week to day.
item.author: info@altcointrading.net
item.dc:creator: KvB
item.content:encoded:
In 2020, Women Are Finally Breaking Into the Bitcoin Industry

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #REPORTS - Typically thought of as a male-dominated industry, the numbers of women on the crypto markets are reportedly increasing. Why is that and what does it mean?

[Read it]

Will Your Bitcoin Investment Suffer from Coronavirus?

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #REPORTS - The changes cannot be ignored any longer.

[Read it]

Products of 2019: What did crypto traders most spend on?

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #REPORTS - Hookers and blow? Could be. It weren't bags of shitcoins though, that's for sure. -- Sharing some insight from tracked links on this blog, just like last year.

[Read it]

Why Are So Many People Trading Cryptocurrency?

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #REPORTS - The crypto trading statistics from Google Trends show a new wave of interest in trading of digital currencies.

[Read it]

Shocking Facts About Cryptocurrency Heists [Infographics]

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #REPORTS - Cryptojacking, ICO exits, scams, malware and thefts - outrageous amounts of cryptos have changed hands through illicit activity.

[Read it]

Monero Wallets in 2018: Finally Some Progress in Light Wallets

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #WALLETS - Updated with overview of Monero smartphone wallets and a way to run the official GUI without your own full node.

[Read it]

Monero Wallets in 2018: Finally Some Progress in Light Wallets

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #ALTCOINS - Updated with overview of Monero smartphone wallets and a way to run the official GUI without your own full node.

[Read it]

Back to Basics: How to buy altcoins (New Kraken rating)

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #EXCHANGES - For daytrading you need the liquidity of your coinpair - in 2018 that can be alt/btc as well as alt/eth or alt/neo in Asia. Alt/fiat pairs are also tradeable very well.

[Read it]

Back to Basics: How to buy altcoins (New Kraken rating)

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #BASICS - For daytrading you need the liquidity of your coinpair - in 2018 that can be alt/btc as well as alt/eth or alt/neo in Asia. Alt/fiat pairs are also tradeable very well.

[Read it]

3 Most Dangerous Cryptocurrency Beginner Mistakes

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #CRYPTO-VALUE-JUDGEMENT - As the interest in crypto picked up a bit in 2020, so are the number of crypto newbies repeating the same old mistakes as the 2016 lot. Let's take a look at the three most dangerous of them.

[Read it]

Wyckoff Avoidance Strategy in Cryptocurrency Trading

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #CRYPTO-VALUE-JUDGEMENT - Wyckoff method of avoidance means to trade only the best stocks in the leading sectors. How to apply this motto when trading cryptocurrencies?

[Read it]

Crypto vs Forex Trading: How do they compare?

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #CRYPTO-VALUE-JUDGEMENT - Are you better off trading bitcoin or forex? Ultimately, it’s about picking the battles, and the right trading strategy.

[Read it]

How to Compare the Fundamental Value of Cryptoassets

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #CRYPTO-VALUE-JUDGEMENT - Guide on how to assess the fundamental value of cryptocurrencies. Some cryptocoins serve for payments and remittance, some are dApp fuel tokens, some are quick spinoffs only used for pump and dump schemes.

[Read it]

The True Crypto Fundamentals: Crypto Mining and Transactions

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #CRYPTO-VALUE-JUDGEMENT - Crypto mining is the true fundamental limit of all PoW cryptocurrencies. Transactions, a somewhat softer fundamental, can also provide some guidance. Learn the basics of the nature of these crypto fundamentals.

[Read it]

Daytrading on Crypto Markets: Good Idea?

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #CRYPTO-TRADING-METHOD - Daytrading means entering and exiting the market in a single day. Is this a good crypto trading strategy?

[Read it]

How is it with arbitrage opportunities in South Korea

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #CRYPTO-TRADING-METHOD - To summarize what is known as everyone seems to be interested in that at the moment.

[Read it]

Time in the Market vs Timing the Market

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #CRYPTO-TRADING-METHOD - They say that in the long run, time in the market beats timing the market. With the short term direction you cannot know for sure - even technical and fundamental analysis together with Reddit sentiment can only give you what's likely, not what's hundred percent sure.

[Read it]

Altcoin Wallets: Tried and True, 2020 Updated

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #CRYPTOCURRENCY-WALLETS - Where to store cryptocurrencies? Best ERC20 cold storage? See a list of altcoin wallets including multicoin wallets, web based wallets and hardware wallets.

[Read it]

Crypto Wallets by Use Case

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #CRYPTOCURRENCY-WALLETS - Arguably the core of 'be your own bank' principle - How did crypto wallets evolve and what are the features you're looking for, as a trader?

[Read it]

Samourai Wallet has released an update that contributes heaps to Bitcoin's fungibility

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #CRYPTOCURRENCY-WALLETS - The 'Bitcoin wallet for the streets' deserves every bit of that marketing slogan.

[Read it]

Trezor devices have serious security vulnerability

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #CRYPTOCURRENCY-WALLETS - ...even after yesterdays security update of the firmware.

[Read it]

PSA - Jaxx Vulnerability (2017)

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #CRYPTOCURRENCY-WALLETS - A 2017 version of the Jaxx wallet has a serious vulnerability that is being worked on - but at the moment is there.

[Read it]

Altcoin Exchanges: Where to buy altcoins in 2020?

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #TRADING-PLATFORMS - Where to buy crypto and where to trade it? Which exchanges are liquid, which have issues and which look like exit scam? Updated 2020.

[Read it]

Michael Foster of LocalCryptos: Venezuela could be start of a bigger movement

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #TRADING-PLATFORMS - Chat about the business of P2P trading, challenges of crypto OTC and how a poor country can matter for the future of crypto.

[Read it]

Evolution of Non-Custodial Trading: Order Execution Management

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #TRADING-PLATFORMS - On non-custodial order execution - what has been done, what is being done and how trade buffering and zero-knowledge API keys can make decentralized exchanges fast, cheap and usable even for bot (algo) trading.

[Read it]

LeverJ Review: Non-custodial derivative trading

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #TRADING-PLATFORMS - A mixture of DEx and a centralized platform so that the trading does not get sluggish when other folks play Cryptokitties.

[Read it]

Don't send ETH from Bitstamp to Bfx

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #TRADING-PLATFORMS - Your money will be lost.

[Read it]

Script Spotlight: Bollinger Band Width

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #CRYPTO-TECHNICAL-ANALYSIS - BBands Variations on Tradingview, focusing on Bollinger Bandwidth this time. In this series we are picking and reviewing TradingView scripts for technical analysis that recently popped up in the daily popular feed.

[Read it]

Technical Analysis in Cryptocurrency Trading

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #CRYPTO-TECHNICAL-ANALYSIS - Technical indicators work. Sometimes. Should you use technical analysis for crypto?

[Read it]

Script Spotlight: Detrended Price Oscillator (DPO)

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #CRYPTO-TECHNICAL-ANALYSIS - The Detrended Price Oscillator strategy tool from TradingView is similar to a moving average, but easier to read.

[Read it]

Technical Analysis: Divergences (With a Divergence Cheat Sheet)

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #CRYPTO-TECHNICAL-ANALYSIS - Divergence is a disagreement between price and an oscillating indicator such as MACD or RSI. It is not strong enough an indicator to enter a position, but it gives an idea of the state of the market.

[Read it]

Cryptocurrency Strategy for Beginners

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #CRYPTO-TECHNICAL-ANALYSIS - Lo and behold, there is a strategy even to hodling.

[Read it]

Products of 2019: What did crypto traders most spend on?

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #META - Hookers and blow? Could be. It weren't bags of shitcoins though, that's for sure. -- Sharing some insight from tracked links on this blog, just like last year.

[Read it]

Stats from 2018 - Readers like Melancholic 100x and Ledger

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #META - Look at one tiny piece of the economy of crypto for payments. Plus a look at search and traffic stats for hardware wallets and what it probably means.

[Read it]

Daytrading on Crypto Markets: Good Idea?

Updated at 07 Aug 2020, 08:53 UTC in #TRADING - Daytrading means entering and exiting the market in a single day. Is this a good crypto trading strategy?

[Read it]

item.title: Revisiting Past Crypto Airdrops:

item.author: editor@thebusinessofcrypto.com

item.content:encoded:
Galilel Exchange Listing from 26 Mar

Avinoc Exchange Listing from 24 Aug

Daneel Exchange Listing from 09 Aug

TRAW Network Ongoing Airdrop Exchange Listing from 09 Aug

Vikky Latoken Hotbit Exchange Listing from 18 Jul

Itis Network token listed but project is dead [Airdropped] Dead Parrot from 25 Aug

Shopiblock $SHB project killed for legal issues, didn't return invested ETH [Airdropped] Dead Parrot from 25 Aug

FavorCoins (Coins4Favors) DOA [Airdropped] Dead Parrot from 30 Jun
